meanings.sent1: The weekend was eventless, just relaxing at home.
meanings.sent2: Her eventless life consisted of routine work and sleep.
meanings.sent3: The eventless party had everyone yawning by 9 pm.
meanings.sent4: The eventless sky was devoid of any stars that night.
meanings.sent5: The eventless desert stretched out endlessly under the scorching sun.

meanings.sent1: The eventless movie failed to capture the audience's attention.
meanings.sent2: His eventless journey to work was uneventful as usual.
meanings.sent3: The eventless day felt like it lasted forever.
meanings.sent4: The eventless sea was as calm as a sleeping baby.
meanings.sent5: The eventless forest was eerily quiet, not a sound to be heard.
